attributes.action: Urgent Appeal for Reconsideration of Spouse Visa Salary Threshold
attributes.additional_details: Come to a reasonable income requirement according to the current employment salaries as this change threatens to strain relationships and create unnecessary distance between loved ones. Couples who contribute positively to society should not be subjected to such obstacles that jeopardize their unity. A fair and compassionate approach to immigration policies is essential for fostering societal well-being.
attributes.background: This change creates difficulties for families trying to reunite & start a chapter of their lives with loved ones. I request a reconsideration, taking into account the financial challenges faced by citizens. Let's work towards a more realistic & inclusive approach to ensure families can stay united.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition -

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
